Class InternshipController

java.lang.Object
controller.InternshipController
public class InternshipController extends Object
Controller class that handles all Internship-related logic. Controllers should use this class instead of accessing Internship model directly. Follows Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on CsvHandler interface abstraction.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Field Details

    • csvHandler

      private final CsvHandler<Internship> csvHandler
      CSV handler for persistence operations

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipController

      public InternshipController(CsvHandler<Internship> csvHandler)
      Constructs an InternshipController with the specified CSV handler. Follows Dependency Inversion Principle - depends on abstraction, not concretion.
      Parameters:
      csvHandler - The CSV handler for persistence operations

    • InternshipController

      public InternshipController()
      Default constructor for backward compatibility. Uses singleton InternshipCsvHandler instance.

  • Method Details

    • getVisibleInternshipsForStudent

      public List<Internship> getVisibleInternshipsForStudent(Student student, FilterSettings filterSettings)
      Retrieves all internships visible to a student based on their profile. Filters internships based on: 1. Visibility toggle (must be visible AND approved) 2. Major match (student's major must match internship's preferred major) 3. Level eligibility (year of study): - Basic: Any year - Intermediate: Year 3 or higher - Advanced: Year 3 or higher 4. Date range (must be within open and close dates) 5. User-applied filters (Status, Major, Level, Closing Date) Default sort: alphabetical by title
      Parameters:
      student - The student for visibility filtering
      filterSettings - Additional filter settings to apply
      Returns:
      List of visible internships matching all criteria

    • getVisibleInternshipsForStudent

      public List<Internship> getVisibleInternshipsForStudent(Student student)
      Retrieves all visible internships for a student (overloaded without filters). Uses default filter settings.
      Parameters:
      student - The student for visibility filtering
      Returns:
      List of visible internships

    • getInternshipsByCreator

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsByCreator(CompanyRepresentative creator, FilterSettings filterSettings)
      Retrieves all internships created by a company representative. Supports filtering and sorting through filter settings.
      Parameters:
      creator - The company representative who created the internships
      filterSettings - Filter settings to apply
      Returns:
      List of internships created by the representative

    • getInternshipsByCreator

      public List<Internship> getInternshipsByCreator(CompanyRepresentative creator)
      Retrieves internships by creator (overloaded without filters). Uses default filter settings.
      Parameters:
      creator - The company representative who created the internships
      Returns:
      List of internships created by the representative

    • getApprovedInternshipsByCreator

      public List<Internship> getApprovedInternshipsByCreator(CompanyRepresentative creator)
      Retrieves all approved internships created by a company representative. Only includes internships with APPROVED status.
      Parameters:
      creator - The company representative who created the internships
      Returns:
      List of approved internships

    • getPendingInternships

      public List<Internship> getPendingInternships()
      Retrieves all internships pending staff approval.
      Returns:
      List of internships with PENDING status

    • createInternship

      public Internship createInternship(String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, CompanyRepresentative creator, int slots)
      Creates a new internship listing. Validates data and enforces maximum limit per company representative.
      Parameters:
      title - The internship title
      description - The internship description
      level - The difficulty level (Basic/Intermediate/Advanced)
      major - The preferred major for applicants
      openDate - The opening date for applications
      closeDate - The closing date for applications
      creator - The company representative creating the internship
      slots - The number of available slots (1-10)
      Returns:
      The created Internship object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails or max limit exceeded

    • validateInternshipData

      private void validateInternshipData(String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int slots)
      Validates internship data before creation or update.
      Parameters:
      title - The internship title
      description - The internship description
      level - The difficulty level
      major - The preferred major
      openDate - The opening date
      closeDate - The closing date
      slots - The number of slots
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any validation fails

    • findInternship

      public Internship findInternship(int internshipID)
      Finds an internship by its ID.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to find
      Returns:
      The found Internship object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found

    • updateInternship

      public void updateInternship(int internshipID, String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, Integer slots)
      Updates an existing internship's details. Null parameters retain existing values.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to update
      title - New title (null to keep existing)
      description - New description (null to keep existing)
      level - New level (null to keep existing)
      major - New preferred major (null to keep existing)
      openDate - New opening date (null to keep existing)
      closeDate - New closing date (null to keep existing)
      slots - New slot count (null to keep existing)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found

    • deleteInternship

      public void deleteInternship(int internshipID)
      Deletes an internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found or cannot be deleted

    • toggleInternshipVisibility

      public boolean toggleInternshipVisibility(int internshipID)
      Toggles the visibility of an internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      true if now visible, false if now invisible
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found

    • updateInternshipApproval

      public void updateInternshipApproval(int internshipID, boolean approve)
      Updates internship approval status.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      approve - true to approve, false to reject
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found

    • loadInternshipsFromCsv

      public void loadInternshipsFromCsv()
      Loads all internships from CSV file. Clears existing data and reloads from disk.

    • saveInternship

      public void saveInternship(Internship internship)
      Saves an internship to CSV. Helper method for other controllers that need to save internships.
      Parameters:
      internship - The internship to save

    • isInternshipOwnedBy

      public boolean isInternshipOwnedBy(int internshipID, CompanyRepresentative companyRep)
      Checks if an internship is owned by a company representative.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      companyRep - The company representative to check
      Returns:
      true if owned by the representative, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found

    • canEditInternship

      public boolean canEditInternship(int internshipID)
      Checks if an internship can be edited.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      true if editable, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if internship not found

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The InternshipStatus
      Throws:

    • getAllInternships

      public List<Internship> getAllInternships(FilterSettings filterSettings)
      Retrieves all internships with filtering (for staff/admin views).
      Parameters:
      filterSettings - Filter settings to apply
      Returns:
      List of filtered internships

    • getAllInternships

      public List<Internship> getAllInternships()
      Retrieves all internships without filtering.
      Returns:
      List of all internships in the system
